info.description: A streaming service API using Go and Gin framework, with Swagger documentation and ffmpeg integration.
info.title: Go Streaming Service API

post.description: Authenticate with username and password to get access and refresh tokens
Revoke the refresh token for the authenticated user
Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access/refresh token pair
Create a new user account and return access and refresh tokens

get.description: Get the status of a video processing job. Only the job owner can view it.
Get a video by its ID
Retrieve the latest videos ordered by creation date. Supports pagination via query params.

post.description: Upload a video file and queue it for async processing. Returns a job ID to track progress.

patch.description: Increment the views of a video by 1
patch.summary: Increment the views of a video

put.description: Update title and description of a video. Only the owner can update.

delete.description: Delete a video by ID. Only the owner can delete.

get.description: Search user by ID in Db
Search user by userName in Db

delete.description: Delete user by ID. Only the owner can delete their own account.
